sentences.chinese: 它有27个字母，意思类似于“充满了荣耀”。

sentences.english: This is the glory of expository preaching, we were told.
sentences.chinese: 有人说，这是释经讲道的荣耀。

sentences.english: Honor and profit lie not in one sack.
sentences.chinese: 代表荣耀，荣誉与利益自古难两全。

sentences.english: 32a light for revelation to the Gentiles and for glory to your people Israel.
sentences.chinese: 是照亮外邦人的光，又是你民以色列的荣耀。

sentences.english: Littleness and glory are the choices open to your striving and your vigilance.
sentences.chinese: 你究竟愿为卑微或为荣耀而警醒奋斗，完全操之于你。

sentences.english: Jesus now lives in the spiritual state of exalted glory.
sentences.chinese: 耶稣现在以灵体住在至高的荣耀里。

sentences.english: It is a great honor to be looked up to by someone.
sentences.chinese: 被某人看得起是一项很大的荣耀。

sentences.english: Glory to God in the highest heaven, and on earth peace among those whom he favors!
sentences.chinese: 在至高之处荣耀归神，在地上平安归他所喜悦的人。

sentences.english: The glory of youths is their strength, but the beauty of the aged is their gray hair.
sentences.chinese: 强壮乃少年人的荣耀，白发为老年人的尊容。

sentences.english: If only Belshazzar had learned to give glory to the true and living God!
sentences.chinese: 如果伯沙撒知道将荣耀归给那又真又活得神就好了。

sentences.english: Knowing his glory but bearing disgrace, He thus becomes the valley for the world.
sentences.chinese: 知道其荣耀，却甘守羞辱，而成为天下的虚谷。

sentences.english: Glorious things are spoken of thee, O city of God. Selah.
sentences.chinese: 神的城阿，有荣耀的事乃指着你说的。

sentences.english: If you have this business ability, you should be using it for God's glory.
sentences.chinese: 如果你有这些才能，你应该使用这样的才能来荣耀神。

sentences.english: All the kings of the nations, even all of them, lie in glory, every one in his own house.
sentences.chinese: 列国的君王俱各在自己阴宅的荣耀中安睡。

sentences.english: A fair death honors the whole life.
sentences.chinese: 一个好的死会荣耀此人的一生。

sentences.english: Then God will be glorified in you.
sentences.chinese: 那么神就会因你而得荣耀。

definition: fully deserving, without any reservations (idiom); entirely worthy (of a title, honor etc)
accomplishment/success/achievement/CL:個|个[ge4]/to achieve (a result)/to create/to bring about
